intro: Push, solve, and unlock your way through 2,000 brain-teasing levels in this addictive puzzle adventure!
description:
Master the art of strategic thinking in this modern take on classic Sokoban puzzles! With 1,000 meticulously crafted levels across 10 vibrant worlds, plus another 1,000 levels in New Game+ mode, you'll never run out of challenges.

Start your journey through increasingly complex puzzles that will test your logic and spatial reasoning. Each completed level rewards you with stars that unlock new worlds, adorable cats, unique balls, and exciting cosmetics - all at your own pace with no pressure.

KEY FEATURES:
• 2,000 total levels (1,000 base + 1,000 New Game+)
• 20 different worlds to play in
• Progressive difficulty that grows with your skills
• Challenge yourself daily and keep your mind sharp
• Star-based progression system
• Collectible cats, balls, and cosmetic items
• Perfect for quick sessions or extended puzzle marathons
• Sharpen your logical thinking and problem-solving abilities

Whether you're a puzzle veteran or new to the genre, there's always a new challenge waiting. How many stars can you collect?
